mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_DEL_BAN_FL, MEMBER_BIRTH, SELF_INTRODUCTION, MEMBER_DISCLOSURE_SCOPE, ADMIN, REPORT_COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') CREATED_AT FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberID} AND MEMBER_DEL_BAN_FL = '1'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO "MEMBER" ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_BIRTH ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberBirth}
)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWING_MEMBER = #{memberNo} AND CONFIRM = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER_MEMBER = #{memberNo} AND CONFIRM = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email} AND MEMBER_DEL_BAN_FL = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id} AND MEMBER_DEL_BAN_FL = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND MEMBER_DEL_BAN_FL = '1'
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND MEMBER_NO != #{memberNo}

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, BI.IMG_NO, BI.IMG_PATH, BI.IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_IMG BI ON B.BOARD_NO = BI.BOARD_NO WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = ( SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND MEMBER_DEL_BAN_FL = 1 ) AND B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BI.IMG_ORDER = 1 ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC OFFSET (#{cp} - 1) * 9 ROWS FETCH NEXT 9 ROWS ONLY
